name: Simple Research Assistant
config_yaml:
name: Simple Research Assistant
model:
  provider: openai
  model: gpt-3.5-turbo
voice:
  provider: 11labs
  voiceId: 21m00Tcm4TlvDq8ikWAM
firstMessage: Hello! I am your research assistant.
tools:
  - name: research_query
    description: Execute research using LangGraph Forge
    url: service://langgraph_forge/research
    method: POST
    body:
      query: '{{query}}'
    parameters:
      - name: query
        type: string
        required: true
systemMessage: You are a helpful research assistant.
